name: Escape the Bulldog
description:
A big bulldog chases whoever has his bone, be fast to get rid of it before he eats you! It's like Hot Potato game but with bigger stakes, you are always at risk, and your enemies too!
If you hold the bone for a long time, you get a super shoot that makes the bulldog destroy yout opponents!
You can hide, you can seek for others, and you can ambush them. Try to be a good person... or not.

Features:
∙ Funny moments when you get to destroy your opponents in ingenious ways
∙ Play against a big boss
∙ High performance
∙ Hold the bone for a long time for a bigger shot
∙ Many powerups: Super speed, Invisibility, Teletransportation Portals, etc.
∙ Beautiful striking 3D visuals
∙ The game is hilarious, relaxing and very addictive
∙ The game Loki would play if he was a real person
